participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and optimistic, she enjoys engaging in conversations and meeting new people.
participant_1.background: Emily has a degree in communications and works in marketing. She loves traveling and often shares her experiences.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and humorous, he often lightens the mood with his jokes and is a good listener.
participant_2.background: Jake is an IT specialist with a passion for technology. He enjoys gaming and often participates in local tournaments.
